name: FPS Blocktober 2019
description:
Here's a selection of levels I've made during blocktober.

The goal was to create interesting levels with a classic FPS controller and some basics AI.

HOW TO PLAY :

  • MOVE : WASD
  • SHOOT : LEFT MOUSE BUTTON
  • RELOAD : R
  • CROUCH : C
  • GRENADE : G
  • RUN : SHIFT
  • JUMP : SPACE

QUIT GAME : Alt + F4
